title: [P1] Implement OS sandbox execution
description: Ship process sandboxing for tool/bash execution per permissions v2 design (macOS seatbelt + linux landlock where supported).

logs.msg: Starting implementation: wire OS sandbox for command execution. Begin by mapping current permission/no_sandbox execution flow.
Deferred during TUI/agent stabilization pass per user priority (headless/sandbox not in current focus).
Roadmap alignment 2026-02-12: still Sprint 17 safety gate, but held until Sprint 16 tk-86lk is closed.
Reprioritized 2026-02-12: sequence after RNK/core TUI direction is validated.
